text:
Nyp may be  not the most advance Polytechnic in singapore but will miss 3 years  studying here,staff and teachers were never once rude ,always patient (from my perspective depends on each student),only negative experience is canteens will get very crowded especially during 12-2(south canteeen)
Other than that 5 stars for this school!

Polytechnic that I love. With infocomm live science health engineering design and business. Free wifi. Great greeneries for caring and nurturing study environment. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for students teacher tourists Expats and locals. Educational excellent for future leaders.
Good Place i stayed there in wrg occasion world Robot Games

One of the best school ever . Lecturer are good and are willing to go the extra mille to teach ! The food there are awesome too . What more it offer many courses for part time learner and full time learner .

Came here for a sharing session. Impressed with the facilities and cleanliness. Student designs are very interesting. Someone ever said. The toilets revealed how civilised a place can be. Here in the design school I saw toys in the toilet, and different kind of hand washes in the toilet. How to interpret that, I wonder.
